idea:
Sustainability is not a requirement but a practice and yes we are late. Remastered is a master idea which has different verticals dealing only with recycled, up-cycled, repurposed fashion and art .

Our verticals are

1) PretRE - Choose your design, choose the regenerated fabric and get your bespoke design delivered at your door step.

2) FLIP - Any idea what you would do with your unused garments lying dead in your closet?.Give it us and we combine then=m and flip them to something absolutely brag worthy.

3) Re-market place - The only market place where our artisans become retailers and the tech helps them do this from the meadows. World is there market

4) DIY artistry -  A modern day problem needs a modern day solution. Amazing artists in the country but no credible platform to access there art, well theremastered.com will be, hire them for artistic services.

5) ExclusIF - Gems of fabrics in India and world but not accessible? really?. One of one helps you create bespoke designs from state of the art tech and mind you, its one of one, rarest of the rare.


We intend to deliver above in phased wise manner and do this with the help of world class digital interaction with embedded services like AR trials, Dramatic 3D designs and auto body measurements for PretRe, ExclusIF and FLIP.


Pre-fed product cataloging solutions, margin calculator and profit predictor for our artists and artisans in Re-market place and DIY artistry.


All of the above via our web and app.

idea:
Tortuga Wealth Managers p ltd company is a SEBI registered investment advisor. We aim to design and deliver, unique quant-based investment strategies to investors in India and around the globe.

Our premier offering is the Turtle strategy â€“ a quant-based asset allocation approach towards investing in equity mutual funds. This is a non-discretionary advisory service is currently offered to HNI clients.

Our unique methodology seeks to adjust equity exposure in response to large shifts in market valuations. The active-passive approach is academically rigorous and backed by data. We believe it is a scientifically superior way to invest for the long term and can generate better risk adjusted performance than the more traditional buy and hold approach to investing in mutual funds.

We have built a 3 year plus track record and have been successful in adding value to all our client accounts. We are looking to scale as we attempt to project this as a prominent strategy for long term equity mutual fund investing.

www.tortugainvest.com
name: TORTUGA WEALTH MANAGERS PRIVATE LIMITED
NINE AND THREE QUARTERS TECH PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Our country has a rich heritage of art and design. Various forms of painting and textile art have flourished for a long time in India. At Kanvas, we believe that we need to protect these dying art forms. Without patronage, the artisans who work tirelessly to create these handicrafts feel disillusioned and prefer to discontinue their practice. They pursue other labours in order to earn a regular source of income. This is terrible news for such valuable, indigenous art-forms.


At Kanvas, our ambition is to revive these ethnic styles by transforming it into a contemporary forms. Some designs are digitalized to make it commercial. Our footwear is created by Indian artisans who give their time and effort into the making of each pair. We want to pursue and nurture Indian art so it thrives in new, enchanting forms.


Kanvas is an Indian brand, and proudly so.
name: KANVAS
